00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00039 #define I2S_TRANSMIT                    0
00040 #define I2S_RECEIVE                             !I2S_TRANSMIT
00041

00043 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLE ***********************/
00044 uint8_t menu[]=
00045         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00046         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00047         " I2S polling mode demo \n\r"
00048         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00049         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00050         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00051         " Use two I2S channels on 2 board to transfer data \n\r"
00052         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00053 uint8_t tx_depth_irq = 0;
00054 uint8_t rx_depth_irq = 0;
00055 uint32_t data;

00058 /* Interrupt service routine */

00063 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00064 /*********************************************************************/
00069 void I2S_IRQHandler()
00070 {
00071         uint8_t rx_level,
00072                         tx_level,
00073                         tx_depth_irq,
00074                         rx_depth_irq;
00075         uint32_t data;
00076         uint8_t i;
00077 
00078         if(I2S_GetIRQStatus(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE)){ //receive interrupt
00079                 rx_level = I2S_GetLevel(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE);
00080                 rx_depth_irq = I2S_GetIRQDepth(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE);
00081 
00082                 if (rx_level >= rx_depth_irq)//receive interrupt
00083                 {
00084                         while(I2S_GetLevel(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE)>0)
00085                         {
00086                                 data = I2S_Receive(LPC_I2S);
00087                                 _DBH32(data); _DBG_("");
00088                         }
00089                 }
00090         }
00091         else if (I2S_GetIRQStatus(LPC_I2S, I2S_TX_MODE))
00092         {
00093                 tx_level = I2S_GetLevel(LPC_I2S, I2S_TX_MODE);
00094                 tx_depth_irq = I2S_GetIRQDepth(LPC_I2S, I2S_TX_MODE);
00095                 if(tx_level <= tx_depth_irq)//transmit interrupt
00096                 {
00097                         for(i=0;i<4;i++)
00098                         {
00099                                 I2S_Send(LPC_I2S,data);
00100                                 _DBH32(data);
00101                                 _DBG_(" Send successful!!!");
00102                                 data++;
00103                                 if(data == 0xFFFFFFFF) data  = 0;
00104                         }
00105                 }
00106         }
00107 }
00108

00115 void print_menu()
00116 {
00117         _DBG_(menu);
00118 }

00121 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00122 /*********************************************************************/
00127 int c_entry (void) {
00128         I2S_MODEConf_Type I2S_ClkConfig;
00129         I2S_CFG_Type I2S_ConfigStruct;
00130         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00131 
00132         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00133          * – 115200bps
00134          * – 8 data bit
00135          * – No parity
00136          * – 1 stop bit
00137          * – No flow control
00138          */
00139         debug_frmwrk_init();
00140 
00141         //print menu screen
00142         print_menu();
00143 
00144         NVIC_EnableIRQ(I2S_IRQn);
00145         //Setup for I2S: RX is similar with TX
00146         /* setup:
00147          *              - wordwidth: 16 bits
00148          *              - stereo mode
00149          *              - master mode for I2S_TX and slave for I2S_RX
00150          *              - ws_halfperiod is 31
00151          *              - not use mute mode
00152          *              - use reset and stop mode
00153          *              - select the fractional rate divider clock output as the source,
00154          *              - disable 4-pin mode
00155          *              - MCLK ouput is disable
00156          *              - Frequency = 44.1 kHz (x=8,y=51 - automatic setting)
00157          * Because we use mode I2STXMODE[3:0]= 0000, I2SDAO[5]=0 and
00158          * I2SRX[3:0]=0000, I2SDAI[5] = 1. So we have I2SRX_CLK = I2STX_CLK
00159          * --> I2SRXBITRATE = 1 (not divide TXCLK to produce RXCLK)
00160          */
00161 
00162 #if I2S_TRANSMIT
00163         /* Pin configuration for I2S Transmitter:
00164          * Assign:      - P0.7 as I2STX_CLK
00165          *                      - P0.8 as I2STX_WS
00166          *                      - P0.9 as I2STX_SDA
00167          */
00168         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00169         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00170         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00171         PinCfg.Pinnum = 7;
00172         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00173         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00174         PinCfg.Pinnum = 8;
00175         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00176         PinCfg.Pinnum = 9;
00177         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00178 
00179         I2S_Init(LPC_I2S);
00180 
00181         /* Audio Config*/
00182         I2S_ConfigStruct.wordwidth = I2S_WORDWIDTH_16;
00183         I2S_ConfigStruct.mono = I2S_STEREO;
00184         I2S_ConfigStruct.stop = I2S_STOP_ENABLE;
00185         I2S_ConfigStruct.reset = I2S_RESET_ENABLE;
00186         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_SLAVE_MODE;
00187         I2S_ConfigStruct.mute = I2S_MUTE_ENABLE;
00188         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00189 
00190         /* Clock Mode Config*/
00191         I2S_ClkConfig.clksel = I2S_CLKSEL_FRDCLK;
00192         I2S_ClkConfig.fpin = I2S_4PIN_DISABLE;
00193         I2S_ClkConfig.mcena = I2S_MCLK_DISABLE;
00194         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_TX_MODE);
00195 
00196         LPC_I2S->I2STXRATE = 0x00;
00197         LPC_I2S->I2STXBITRATE = 0x00;
00198         I2S_SetBitRate(LPC_I2S, 0, I2S_TX_MODE);
00199 
00200         I2S_Start(LPC_I2S);
00201         I2S_IRQConfig(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,4);
00202         I2S_IRQCmd(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,ENABLE);
00203 
00204 #else
00205         /* Pin configuration for I2S Receiver:
00206          * Assign:      - P0.4 as I2SRX_CLK
00207          *                      - P0.5 as I2SRX_WS
00208          *                      - P0.6 as I2SRX_SDA
00209          */
00210         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00211         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00212         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00213         PinCfg.Pinnum = 4;
00214         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00215         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00216         PinCfg.Pinnum = 5;
00217         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00218         PinCfg.Pinnum = 6;
00219         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00220 
00221         I2S_Init(LPC_I2S);
00222 
00223         I2S_ConfigStruct.wordwidth = I2S_WORDWIDTH_16;
00224         I2S_ConfigStruct.mono = I2S_STEREO;
00225         I2S_ConfigStruct.stop = I2S_STOP_ENABLE;
00226         I2S_ConfigStruct.reset = I2S_RESET_ENABLE;
00227         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_MASTER_MODE;
00228         I2S_ConfigStruct.mute = I2S_MUTE_DISABLE;
00229         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00230 
00231         /* Clock Mode Config*/
00232         I2S_ClkConfig.clksel = I2S_CLKSEL_FRDCLK;
00233         I2S_ClkConfig.fpin = I2S_4PIN_DISABLE;
00234         I2S_ClkConfig.mcena = I2S_MCLK_DISABLE;
00235         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_RX_MODE);
00236 
00237         /* Set up frequency and bit rate*/
00238         I2S_FreqConfig(LPC_I2S, 44100, I2S_RX_MODE);
00239         I2S_IRQConfig(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,4);
00240         I2S_IRQCmd(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,ENABLE);
00241 
00242         _DBG_("Press '1' to start I2S operation...");
00243         while(_DG !='1');
00244         I2S_Start(LPC_I2S);
00245         _DBG_("I2S Start ...");
00246 #endif
00247         while(1);
00248 }
00249 
00250 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00251    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00252    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00253    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00254    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00255 int main(void)
00256 {
00257     return c_entry();
00258 }

00260 #ifdef  DEBUG

00269 {

00271          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00272

00274         while(1);
00275 }
